lyrics.text: Lesson 31. Success Story. First listen and then answer the question. What was Frank's
lyrics.translation: 第31课。成功故事。首先听录音，然后回答问题。弗兰克的是什么

lyrics.text: first job? Yesterday afternoon, Frank Hawkins was telling me about his experiences as a
lyrics.translation: 第一份工作？昨天下午，弗兰克·霍金斯在向我讲述他的经历

lyrics.text: young man. Before he retired, Frank was the head of a very large business company. But
lyrics.translation: 年轻人。在退休之前，弗兰克是一家非常大的商业公司的负责人。但是

lyrics.text: as a boy, he used to work in a small shop. It was his job to repair bicycles, and at
lyrics.translation: 作为一个男孩，他过去常常在一家小商店工作。他的工作是修理自行车，而且

lyrics.text: the time, he used to work 14 hours a day. He saved money for years, and in 1958, he
lyrics.translation: 那时候，他每天工作14个小时。他存了好几年的钱，然后在1958年，他

lyrics.text: bought a small workshop of his own. In his twenties, Frank used to make spare parts for
lyrics.translation: 买下了一个属于自己的小作坊。在二十多岁时，弗兰克过去常常制作备件

lyrics.text: airplanes. At that time, he had two helpers. In a few years, the small workshop had become
lyrics.translation: 飞机。在那个时候，他有两个助手。几年后，这个小作坊已经变成了

lyrics.text: a large factory, which employed 728 people. Frank smiled when he remembered his hard early
lyrics.translation: 一个大型工厂，雇佣了728人。当弗兰克回想起他艰难的早年时，他微笑了。

lyrics.text: years and the long road to success. He was still smiling when the door opened and his
lyrics.translation: 年复一年，通往成功的漫长道路。当门打开时，他仍然面带微笑

lyrics.text: wife came in. She wanted him to repair their grandson's bicycle.
lyrics.translation: 妻子走了进来。她想让他修理孙子的自行车。
